name: Hashtag Goals
tech: Node.js, Express, MySQL, Sequelize, Handlebars, Semantic UI, Passport, Bcrypt, Heroku
description: The user creates an account then chooses a goal and how many times a week they can dedicate to achieving their goal. A calendar populates a series of minor milestones at their requested frequency.

name: Eat A Burger
description: A burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM. Follows an MVC design pattern to use Node and MySQL to query and route data, and Handlebars to generate the HTML.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: The Weather Dashboard utilizes the Openweather API to display specific weather information based on an city submitted into the Search input.

name: Helping Out
description: The user is asked to Donate Food, Blood or Time then inputs their zip code to get results for charities near them. These can be saved to their Favorites.

name: Comedy Stream
tech: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Tailwind.css, Fuse.js, Days.js, Passport, Bcrypt, JSON Web Token, Heroku
description: Comedy Stream is a hub for all online live comedy events. Users can create an account to add new shows.

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: 9am - 5pm scheduler with blocks highlighted by past, present and future. A user's input information is saved in local storage.
